name: Crowned Heads - Le Patissier - No. 54
additionalNotes: This medium-bodied stick delivers notes of spice, earth and sweetness. Its oily USA Connecticut Broadleaf maduro wrapper covers a Nicaraguan binder and a Costa Rican and Nicaraguan filler. Handmade in Nicaragua at the Tabacalera Pichardo factory, the Crowned Heads Le Patissier No. 54 provides a balanced and complex smoking indulgence that makes it an excellent after dinner cigar. The cigar was named after the French term for pastry chef.
